briefTitle: Evaluation of Safety and Tolerability of Creon Micro in Children Younger Than Four Years With Pancreatic Exocrine Insufficiency
officialTitle: An Open Label, Multicenter Study Evaluating Safety and Tolerability of Creon Micro in Pediatric Subjects From at Least One Month to Less Than Four Years of Age With Pancreatic Exocrine Insufficiency Due to Cystic Fibrosis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of Creon micro in children younger than four years with pancreatic exocrine insufficiency.
